segmentosSRT.text: I learned all I know from you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
How do you think we lost
most of what we had in the first place?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
You're the one they call big bastard, Xu,
not me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
Mother, when you finish,
send him to his room.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: He's just singing to himself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Don't cry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: It's not good for the baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
You said you wouldn't gamble
if I got pregnant.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Who was gambling? I went to watch.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: get a rickshaw to take my wife home. I'm...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Of course.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: They're not mine. It's how I make my living.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan, the place is deserted.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I'm still dizzy from drinking!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: What happened? No one's left?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: They won't shoot us?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Not as long as you've got your hands up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
- On one of the wounded.
- It's a killing field.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: they captured two mountains a day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I see your point.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
All I've seen at the worksites
are student marching bands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: We'll spur them on with puppet shows.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: You can leave those.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: We don't know what's going on.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Do you expect me to believe that?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
It's sabotage.
Sabotage to the communal kitchen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: How so?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Can't you see I'm doing this for our family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Don't you understand?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: If you indulge him, we'll all go to ruin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I'll hit him again if I have to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Sit then. Right in front of me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Isn't he your own flesh and blood?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: You, looking after us! After all these years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Ask him again.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Say I want him to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, daddy wants you to see the show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, is that tea for me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Good boy, bring it over here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Daddy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: How do you like my singing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
- He's already here.
- Tell him to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: You won't stay?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Have some lunch first.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: No, really.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't rush off!
- I'll make you something to eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Do stay! Come on inside.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: "The working class leads us all."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Come on, you can't cry today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: At least it's loud enough for her to hear.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Isn't the tea ready yet?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng's been here for ages.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Everyone knows you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Do as Mommy says and push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Okay, we're going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
- Sorry for the trouble.
- It's our job.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
- How is he?
- They're both fine!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, you're a lucky man!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: My son was only 5.5 pounds.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19
